introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: The protection of your personal data is important to us. This privacy policy informs you about how we collect, process, and protect your personal data when you use our application.

responsible.title: 2. Responsible Party
responsible.content: The operator of this application is responsible for data processing. If you have any questions about data protection, you can reach us via the contact details provided below.

dataCollection.title: 3. What Data is Collected?
dataCollection.content: When registering and using our application, we collect the following data:

items.name: Name (to personalize your account)
items.browser: Browser and device information (for session management)

purpose.title: 4. Purpose of Data Processing
purpose.content: We process your data for the following purposes:

items.account: Creation and management of your user account
items.security: Ensuring the security of our services
items.communication: Communication with you regarding your account

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis
legalBasis.content: The processing of your data is based on Art. 6 (1) lit. b GDPR (contract performance) and Art. 6 (1) lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in the security of our services).

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.content: We store your personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the stated purposes or until you delete your account. After deletion of your account, your data will be deleted immediately unless there are legal retention obligations.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.content: According to GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.restriction: Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)

contact.title: 8. Contact
